additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, red chilli, garlic, lemongrass, sunflower oil, shallot, sugar, galangal, salt, ginger, modified tapioca starch (1442), fresh turmeric, dried red chilli, turmeric powder, colour (paprika oleoresin), acidity regulator (330), clove powder, nutmeg powder, mace powder, cardamom powder

description: This aromatic, bright Indian influenced curry has a rich, sweet taste with hints of roasted spices and turmeric, suitable for all kinds of meat and fish. Gluten Free. No artificial preservatives added. Suitable for vegetarians. Mild
name: Yellow Curry Paste
